hero.headline: Take control of your finances in 10 seconds
hero.subheadline: Mitsitsy is the mobile app that lets you track every Ariary spent, even without internet. Designed for Madagascar, adapted for the world.

benefits.fast: Record an expense in under 10 seconds

problem.headline: You never know where your money goes?

salary.title: Your salary arrives... and vanishes
salary.description: You withdraw cash from the ATM. A week later, your wallet is empty. Where did that money go? Impossible to know.

tools.title: Excel? Too slow. Banking apps? Useless.
tools.description: Banking apps only show ATM withdrawals - not what you do with that cash afterwards.

offline.title: Most apps don't work without internet
offline.description: In Madagascar, connection is unstable and expensive. Apps that require internet? Impossible to use.

complex.title: Too many fields to fill
complex.description: Who has time to categorize 50 fields for a baguette? Finance apps are designed for accountants.

problem.agitation: The result? You work hard, but never manage to save. Every month, it's the same story: money slips through your fingers like sand. It's not a willpower problem. It's a tool problem.

solution.headline: Mitsitsy: simple, fast, and 100% offline
solution.valueProposition: Mitsitsy is the first expense tracking app designed for cash economies like Madagascar. Our promise: record an expense in under 10 seconds, without ever needing internet.

see.title: See where your money goes
see.description: At a glance, understand your daily, weekly, monthly expenses. Simple charts that reveal your habits.

fast.title: 10 seconds, no more
fast.description: Amount -> Category -> Saved. That's it. No useless fields, no unnecessary questions.

offline.title: Works everywhere, even without internet
offline.description: At the market, in the bush, in the taxi-be: your app works. Your data stays on your phone, secure.
offline.outcome: No more excuses not to track

currency.title: MGA, EUR, USD - all in one
currency.description: Manage multiple currencies with automatic conversion. Perfect for travelers and expats.
currency.outcome: One app for all your finances

fast.title: 10-second entry

whatif.title: "What-If" Scenarios

unlimited.title: Unlimited transactions
unlimited.description: Infinite pagination, date grouping, recoverable deletion.

faq.sectionSubtitle: Everything you need to know about Mitsitsy

availability.question: When will the app be available?
availability.answer: Mitsitsy is currently in development. Sign up for our newsletter to be notified at launch and get early access.

free.question: Will the app be free?
free.answer: Yes. Mitsitsy will be 100% free with no ads. All features will be accessible without paying. We plan an optional Premium version with cloud sync, but the basic app will always remain free.

offline.question: Can I use the app without internet?
offline.answer: Absolutely. That's our main difference. Mitsitsy will work entirely offline. Recording, viewing, charts - everything will work without internet.

security.question: Will my data be secure?
security.answer: Yes. All your data will be stored locally on your phone in a secure SQLite database. No data will be sent to external servers. We won't have access to your financial information.

currencies.question: Which currencies will be supported?
currencies.answer: At launch: Malagasy Ariary (MGA), Euro (EUR), and US Dollar (USD). Automatic currency conversion will be included.

platforms.question: On which platforms will the app be available?
platforms.answer: Mitsitsy will be available on Android (Google Play Store) at launch. An iOS version (App Store) is planned for later.

notify.question: How can I be notified of the launch?
notify.answer: Sign up for our newsletter above. You'll receive an email as soon as the app is available, plus exclusive tips to better manage your money.

planning.question: How does budget planning work?
planning.answer: You can create a plan with a target amount and deadline. Add items with their amounts. The app will track your progress. When ready, convert the plan to real transactions in one tap.
